vernac_cmds: Lemma mod2_cases: forall (n: Z), n mod 2 = 0 \/ n mod 2 = 1.
Lemma div_mul_undo: forall a b, b <> 0 -> a mod b = 0 -> a / b * b = a.
replace (b * 1) with b in A by omega.
Lemma mod_0_r: forall (m: Z), m mod 0 = 0.
Lemma sub_mod_0: forall (a b m: Z), a mod m = 0 -> b mod m = 0 -> (a - b) mod m = 0.
Lemma add_mod_0: forall a b m : Z, a mod m = 0 -> b mod m = 0 -> (a + b) mod m = 0.
Lemma Z_mod_mult': forall a b : Z, (a * b) mod a = 0.
Lemma mod_add_r: forall a b, b <> 0 -> (a + b) mod b = a mod b.
Lemma mod_pow2_same_cases: forall a n, a mod 2 ^ n = a -> 2 ^ n = 0 /\ a = 0 \/ 0 <= a < 2 ^ n.
assert (n < 0 \/ 0 <= n) as C by omega.
Lemma mod_pow2_same_bounds: forall a n, a mod 2 ^ n = a -> 0 <= n -> 0 <= a < 2 ^ n.
Lemma pow2_pos: forall n, 0 <= n -> 0 < 2 ^ n.
Lemma pow2_times2: forall i, 0 < i -> 2 ^ i = 2 * 2 ^ (i - 1).
Lemma pow2_div2: forall i, 0 <= i -> 2 ^ (i - 1) = 2 ^ i / 2.
assert (i = 0 \/ 0 < i) as C by omega.
Lemma div_mul_undo_le: forall a b, 0 <= a -> 0 < b -> a / b * b <= a.
pose proof (Zmod_eq_full a b) as P.
pose proof (Z.mod_bound_pos a b) as Q.
Lemma testbit_true_nonneg: forall a i, 0 <= a -> 0 <= i -> Z.testbit a i = true -> 2 ^ i <= a.
eapply Z.le_trans; [| apply (div_mul_undo_le a (2 ^ i)); omega].
replace (2 ^ i) with (1 * 2 ^ i) at 1 by omega.
Lemma range_div_pos: forall a b c d, 0 < d -> a <= b <= c -> a / d <= b / d <= c / d.
Lemma testbit_true_nonneg': forall a i, 0 <= i -> 2 ^ i <= a < 2 ^ (i + 1) -> Z.testbit a i = true.
pose proof (pow2_pos i H) as Q.
rewrite Z_div_same in A by omega.
pose proof (Z.div_lt_upper_bound a (2 ^ i) 2 Q) as P.
replace i with (i + 1 - 1) in P by omega.
rewrite <- pow2_times2 in P by omega.
replace (i + 1 - 1) with i in P by omega.
Lemma testbit_false_nonneg: forall a i, 0 <= a < 2 ^ i -> 0 < i -> Z.testbit a (i - 1) = false -> a < 2 ^ (i - 1).
assert (2 ^ (i - 1) <= a < 2 ^ i \/ a < 2 ^ (i - 1)) as C by omega.
replace i with (i - 1 + 1) in C at 2 by omega.
Lemma signed_bounds_to_sz_pos: forall sz n, - 2 ^ (sz - 1) <= n < 2 ^ (sz - 1) -> 0 < sz.
assert (0 < sz \/ sz - 1 < 0) as C by omega.
rewrite Z.pow_neg_r in H by assumption.
Lemma two_digits_encoding_inj_lo: forall base a b c d: Z, 0 <= b < base -> 0 <= d < base -> base * a + b = base * c + d -> b = d.
specialize P with (b := base) (q := c) (r := d).
Lemma two_digits_encoding_inj_hi: forall base a b c d: Z, 0 <= b < base -> 0 <= d < base -> base * a + b = base * c + d -> a = c.
Lemma Z_to_nat_neg: forall (n: Z), n < 0 -> Z.to_nat n = 0%nat.

command: replace (b * 1) with b in A by omega.
assert (n < 0 \/ 0 <= n) as C by omega.
assert (i = 0 \/ 0 < i) as C by omega.
pose proof (Zmod_eq_full a b) as P.
pose proof (Z.mod_bound_pos a b) as Q.
eapply Z.le_trans; [| apply (div_mul_undo_le a (2 ^ i)); omega].
replace (2 ^ i) with (1 * 2 ^ i) at 1 by omega.
pose proof (pow2_pos i H) as Q.
rewrite Z_div_same in A by omega.
pose proof (Z.div_lt_upper_bound a (2 ^ i) 2 Q) as P.
replace i with (i + 1 - 1) in P by omega.
rewrite <- pow2_times2 in P by omega.
replace (i + 1 - 1) with i in P by omega.
assert (2 ^ (i - 1) <= a < 2 ^ i \/ a < 2 ^ (i - 1)) as C by omega.
replace i with (i - 1 + 1) in C at 2 by omega.
assert (0 < sz \/ sz - 1 < 0) as C by omega.
rewrite Z.pow_neg_r in H by assumption.
specialize P with (b := base) (q := c) (r := d).
